SELECT ts.courseDesignTeacherStudentID AS selKey, ta.classNames, ti.teacherNum, ti.teacherName, ia.courseDesignName, ia.courseDesignNum, ia.yearNum, ia.semester, ia.startTime, ia.endTime FROM t_courseDesign_TeacherStudent ts JOIN t_courseDesign_teacher_arrange ta ON ts.courseDesignTeacherArrangeID = ta.courseDesignTeacherArrangeID JOIN t_courseDesign_info_arrange ia ON ta.courseDesignArrangeID = ia.courseDesignArrangeID JOIN t_teacher_base_info ti ON ti.teacherID = ta.teacherID WHERE
ia.yearNum = #{yearNum} AND
ia.semester = #{semester} AND
ts.studentID = #{userID}

SELECT ta.courseDesignTeacherArrangeID AS selKey, ta.classNames, ti.teacherNum, ti.teacherName, ia.courseDesignName, ia.courseDesignNum, ia.yearNum, ia.semester, ia.startTime, ia.endTime FROM t_courseDesign_teacher_arrange ta JOIN t_courseDesign_info_arrange ia ON ta.courseDesignArrangeID = ia.courseDesignArrangeID JOIN t_teacher_base_info ti ON ti.teacherID = ta.teacherID WHERE
ia.yearNum = #{yearNum} AND
ia.semester = #{semester} AND
ta.teacherID = #{userID}

SELECT ta.classNames, ti.teacherNum, ti.teacherName, ia.courseDesignName, ia.courseDesignNum, ia.yearNum, ia.semester, ia.startTime, ia.endTime, ia.CourseArrangeInfo FROM t_courseDesign_teacher_arrange ta JOIN t_courseDesign_info_arrange ia ON ta.courseDesignArrangeID = ia.courseDesignArrangeID JOIN t_teacher_base_info ti ON ti.teacherID = ta.teacherID WHERE ta.courseDesignTeacherArrangeID = #{courseDesignTeacherArrangeID}

SELECT si.studentID, si.studentName FROM t_courseDesign_TeacherStudent ts JOIN t_student_base_info si ON ts.studentID = si.studentID WHERE ts.courseDesignTeacherArrangeID = #{courseDesignTeacherArrangeID}
